name: driveshaft
description: Add SPA-like navigation to your multi page app leveraging the navigate event in the browser.

scripts.deploy:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
